description: This file defines dummy lesson data and related utility functions for a React-based microlearning platform. It includes constants for UI labels, functions to generate lesson summaries and takeaways from descriptions, and exports for dummy lessons and environment flag checks.

methods.name: bulletsFrom
methods.description: Generates up to three bullet points from a lesson description.

methods.name: summaryFrom
methods.description: Creates a short summary string from a lesson description, truncated if necessary.
